messages.text: Lufthansa Group Inspirational AI flight assistant. Nice to meet you!
Hello! To assist you better, could you please share your travel intentions today? Are you looking for a one-way or return flight, and do you have any specific destinations or dates in mind?
Thank you for sharing Zurich as a destination. To assist you further, could you please let me know your departure city and the travel dates?
Could you please provide a more specific location or city near which you are, so I can find the nearest airport for you?
